column1: text

☝Come on Drake we counted on you and you need to listen to your fans on 
this one. I get he was trying to find a new look but this this right here is 
terrible he turned into the regular old rappers and they have terrible 
music and I'm not trying to hate on Drake, I've been a fan of his ever 
since he was putting the mixtapes out. I don't know if he is running out of 
ideas or not but I am not impressed and I know alot of people are not 
either. But all Drake fans know that he can do WAY WAY better. He is one of 
the kings of the rap gang but with this, someone's gonna take the crown

It wuz good I liked it but it had to much hype for what we got on the "mixtape" ... 
its fire ...but could of been better

Great Mixtape Drake is kinda overshadowed on this mixtape because Future gets to feature 
more on the mixtape than Drake, but it's an outstanding piece of work done 
by both rappers.

Interesting Listen Drake and Future collaborate very well! I had to buy this album after 
listening to it 50+ times beforehand. I enjoy every song and there's a 
decent amount of variety between them. Only buy this album if you're okay 
with Future though, because he can 'jibber jabber' and it can be hard to 
understand him but the vibe is great.

The only decent songs on here are Jumpman & Diamonds Dancing. I would love 
to see Drake do something like this with The Weeknd rather than Future.

Really Good! I thought the mixtape was hella good, but I think they should have added 
more songs. Jumpman and Big Rings are my favorite!
Str8 Fire If your rating this 1 or 2 stars you have no taste in real music

You are all narrow-minded individuals I'm reading all these comments from people hating on this guys music just 
because its not their style. Saying things like he rips off other people. 
He's paying homage to those who came before him, educating people on 
different eras and styles, and putting his own thumbprint on it. He's more 
talented than 90% of the people who make music these days. If you don't 
like music you don't have to automatically be haters. This isn't even my 
style or taste but i can still recognize the talent of production.

Genius composition and collaboration Ronson went above and beyond to release this highly underrated album. Yes, 
we are tired of uptown funk, but should we be? Bruno mars has always been a 
hidden gem and a bit of a puppet in the pop music industry, but uptown 
special exploits his true capabilities as a suave and cool singer. Getting 
Wyatt from miike snow and Kevin from tame impala goes to show ronson's 
music range is both extremely broad and tasteful. Not to mention, both 
Kevin and Andrew took a lot of influence from ronson upon the album compl

Carrie Underwood: Decade #1 I never watched American Idol. The first time watched it was when Carrie 
was on the first night of trying out to get the golden ticket. I decided 
then and there she would win it all. Really, my first time to ever watch 
the show. I watched every time it was on that year and have never watched 
it since. She is an awesome singer and will be a great mom.

God certainly gifted her with such beautiful voice!! And amazingly 
powerful...!! "How Great Thou Art" is my favorite. And to see it performed on YouTube 
brings tears & goose bumps!!

I love Carrie Underwood so so so so much more then anything ever!☺ Omgs, omgs, omgs, oms, omgs, omgs, omgs, omgs, omgs, omgs, omgs, omgs, 
omgs, omgs, omgs, omgs, omgs, omgs, omgs, omgs, omgs, omgs, omgs, OMGS!! 
Carrie Underwood's brand new album called "Greatest Hits: Decade: #1" is 
finally coming out tomorrow OMGSSS I cannot wait to finally get it!! I 
already pre-ordered it a couple of months ago and i cannot wait until i 
finally get it yayyyyyyyyyy woooooohooooooo yayyy me!!! I'm so so so so 
happy and so so so so excited, omgsss I cannot believe Carrie Underwood's 
brand new album called "Greatest Hits: Decade: #1" is finally coming out 
tomorrow!! I have all four of Carrie Underwood's albums: first one: Some 
Hearts, second one: Carnival Ride, third one: Play On, forth one: Blown 
Away and all i just need is her fifth album which would be her "Greatest 
Hits: Decade: #1" thats FINALLY OUT TOMORROW!!! (December 9th) This is so 
so exciting and so so wonderful to me! I'm so so happy and so so filled 
with joy inside and outside! My hearts fluttering of all the excitement and 
happiness! I'll be listening to all of Carrie Underwood's songs on her 
brand new album called "Greatest Hits: Decade: #1" this whole week, next 
week and always and forever!!☺☺

Carrie Underwood Greatest Hits Wonderful Album for the Best Winner of American Idol, a true genuine

Music Good Name again, Thank You Carrie Underwood

I love Imagine Dragons For a few years, Imagine Dragons has been jumping back and forth between 
my favorite and second favorite bands. Imagine Dragons tried to change 
their sound but it didn't work. They're still the same band. Nothing has 
changed in their awesome sound since I first started.listening to them in 
2011.

FINALLY! I've been waiting SO long for these exclusive songs to come out to the 
public! But if you're looking to pre-order it, just wait until it comes 
out, because I pre-ordered the original Smoke + Mirrors album, and when it 
came out, it glitched out and wouldn't download. So my advice to you: wait 
for it to come out, and THEN buy it!

One of the best I've ever heard I am not even exaggerating, this is one of the best albums of this time! I 
have listened to it since the release, and I still never get sick of it. 
Knowing it was Twenty One Pilots, I knew it had to be good. Turns out, I 
was right. Every song catches my attention and is different from each 
other. These songs are different from most of the things the common people 
would listen but since they now play Stressed Out on the radio and most 
responses are well, it seems we all connect. 4 years listening & proud!

album to a reggae inspired hip hop vibe! My favorite artist right now.

It's alright Being listening to Twenty one pilots for years now and this probably is 
the most disappointing album. It's not a bad album but it had so much 
potential to be great! They toned it down a bit. The beat for the songs 
were amazing and a bunch of build up in lots of the songs but goes back 
down trying to be conservative. Still a great band but album isn't their 
best. Lyrics still inspirational as hell!
